title: Data set - improving the reliability of data

content.prompt: Which of the following would add the most support to the reliability of this series of experiments?

choices.label: Duplicate the experiment under identical conditions, and get similar results.
Add a fifth tank with even higher levels of UV radiation.
Repeat the experiment under different conditions with different scientists.
Use phytoplankton from widely varying locations, and get similar results.
Increase sample size by using a greater number of phytoplankton in each tank.

skill.text: Skill 4.E: Explain modifications to an experimental procedure that will alter results.
